metadata.name: High Court Affidavit
metadata.description: Affidavit template for filing before High Courts in India. Follows High Court formatting standards with proper verification clause.

required_fields.label: Deponent Name
required_fields.description: Full legal name of the person making the affidavit

required_fields.label: Deponent Address
required_fields.description: Complete residential address of the deponent

required_fields.label: Deponent Occupation
required_fields.description: Profession or occupation of the deponent

required_fields.label: Statement of Facts
required_fields.description: The facts and statements being affirmed under oath
required_fields.example: 1. I am the petitioner in the above writ petition. 2. I state that the impugned order is illegal and arbitrary.

required_fields.label: Verification Place
required_fields.description: Place where the affidavit is verified and sworn

optional_fields.label: Case Reference
optional_fields.description: Related case number if affidavit is filed in pending proceedings

optional_fields.label: List of Exhibits
optional_fields.description: List of documents attached as exhibits to the affidavit
optional_fields.example: Annexure-1: Impugned Order, Annexure-2: Service Record

template_content:
IN THE HIGH COURT OF _______________
AT _______________

[CIVIL/CRIMINAL] [WRIT/MISC.] [PETITION/APPLICATION] NO. _____ OF _____

IN THE MATTER OF:
_______________
... Petitioner(s)/Applicant(s)

Versus

_______________
... Respondent(s)/Opposite Party(ies)

AFFIDAVIT

I, {deponent_name}, aged about _____ years, {deponent_occupation}, residing at {deponent_address}, do hereby solemnly affirm and declare as under:

{statement_facts}

VERIFICATION

I, the above-named deponent, do hereby verify that the contents of the above affidavit are true and correct to my personal knowledge and belief and nothing material has been concealed or suppressed therefrom.

Verified at {verification_place} on this _____ day of _____, 2024.

DEPONENT

Before me,
NOTARY / OATH COMMISSIONER
